page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT PAISLEY
page.content: For a{Teenager}in the Hunterhill area entertainment can be found in the form of{Discos}and{Youth Clubs}for all ages.Every Thursday in the South School there is a Youth Club where you can play Snooker and pool.On Friday nights there is a disco.There is also a disco in St. Charles' Church Hall every two months or so. There are also{Cubs}and{Scouts}in the local{schools}and{Karate}and{Football} sports clubs are held in the area. Teenagers over 18 would have to travel into the centre of Paisley to go to discos there. On Mondays in St. Serf's School there is the{Monday Club}where there are{ {computer games}and{snooker tables}for the 20 to 30 teenagers who go there. The discos in the centre of Paisley are better as D.J.'s from local radio stations go to them.
